name: Balance Party Vol.1
description:
IMPORTANT: 

  • This game requires the TiltGear to be played (sold separately) 
  • If you got the Mac Version, please right click on the .app file and click Open. 
  • If you got the Windows Version, please unzip the file and open the .exe.

Six games for you to play either alone, trying to reach or highest score in the good old arcade style, or with a friend in a series of fast and thrilling competitions to see who is the most skilled and balanced player.


Vase Walk:

Can you balance the jar on your head?
Try not to lose your balance and drop the jar. If you drop the jar, you lose.

Bouncy Roads:

Cycling can be dangerous on the streets! 

Stay safe and avoid the bouncing tires. You lose if you hit one of them.

One Leg Balance:

Stay balanced on one legged for the longest possible time. But be careful of the other kids trying to push you to the ground.

Slingshot:

Take aim and destroy the target! Try to break your record 


My Super Kandorah:

Float with your Super Kandorah back to earth, avoid the obstacles on your way or your will lose your balance!

Planet Defender:

Destroy all of the approaching asteroids with your colored shots!  Can you destroy them before they get too close and defend the planet?
